module.name: avm-res-network-bastionhost
module.display_name: Azure Verified Module for Azure Bastion
module.description:
Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for Bastion Host

This module provides a generic way to create and manage a Azure Bastion resource supporting Developer, Basic, Standard, and Premium SKUs, including features like telemetry, session recording, tunneling, and role assignments.

inputs.name: diagnostic_settings
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                                     = optional(string, null)
    log_categories                           = optional(set(string), [])
    log_groups                               = optional(set(string), ["allLogs"])
    metric_categories                        = optional(set(string), ["AllMetrics"])
    log_analytics_destination_type           = optional(string, "Dedicated")
    workspace_resource_id                    = optional(string, null)
    storage_account_resource_id              = optional(string, null)
    event_hub_authorization_rule_resource_id = optional(string, null)
    event_hub_name                           = optional(string, null)
    marketplace_partner_resource_id          = optional(string, null)
  }))

inputs.name: ip_configuration
inputs.type:
object({
    name                             = optional(string)
    subnet_id                        = string
    create_public_ip                 = optional(bool, true)
    public_ip_tags                   = optional(map(string), null)
    public_ip_merge_with_module_tags = optional(bool, true)
    public_ip_address_name           = optional(string, null)
    public_ip_address_id             = optional(string, null)
  })

inputs.name: lock
role_assignments
inputs.type:
map(object({
    role_definition_id_or_name             = string
    principal_id                           = string
    description                            = optional(string, null)
    skip_service_principal_aad_check       = optional(bool, false)
    condition                              = optional(string, null)
    condition_version                      = optional(string, null)
    delegated_managed_identity_resource_id = optional(string, null)
    principal_type                         = optional(string, null)
  }))

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The name of the Azure Bastion resource

outputs.name: resource_id
outputs.description: The ID of the Azure Bastion resource

outputs.name: dns_name
outputs.description: The FQDN of the Azure Bastion resource
